title: Logged on this morning...
body:
No more forums and no more general discussion...
[](http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120616003315/random-ness/images/9/9f/Darth_vader_no.gif)

WHY YOU DO THIS TO US RITO?

replies.body:
Seconded.
May the toxicity of the old forums stay there, dead, forever.

Let the new chapter of positivity begin.
No, it was not 'nice'. It was a bad surprise.
Look at the bright side. {{champion:133}}  We can't ignore the existence of Quinn now.
